verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> to Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Mal'akhi <S%H4401><s%>.

I have loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>. Yet ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Wherein hast thou loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us? Was not Esav <S%H6215><s%> Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>? saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: yet I loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>,

And I hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his mountains <S%H2022><s%> and his heritage <S%H5159><s%> waste <S%H8077><s%> for the dragons <S%H8568><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

Whereas Edom <S%H123><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We are impoverished <S%H7567><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, but we will return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the desolate places <S%H2723><s%>; thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, They shall build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, but I will throw down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, The border <S%H1366><s%> of wickedness <S%H7564><s%>, and, The people <S%H5971><s%> against whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath indignation <S%H2194><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and ye shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> will be magnified <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the border <S%H1366><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

A son <S%H1121><s%> honoureth <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, and a servant <S%H5650><s%> his master <S%H113><s%>: if then I be a father <S%H1><s%>, where is mine honour <S%H3519><s%>? and if I be a master <S%H113><s%>, where is my fear <S%H4172><s%>? saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> unto you, O Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, that despise <S%H959><s%> <S%H8802><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%>. And ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Wherein have we despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> ?

Ye offer <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8688><s%> polluted <S%H1351><s%> <S%H8794><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> upon mine altar <S%H4196><s%>; and ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Wherein have we polluted <S%H1351><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee? In that ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The table <S%H7979><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is contemptible <S%H959><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

And if ye offer <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> for sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, is it not evil <S%H7451><s%>? and if ye offer <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the lame <S%H6455><s%> and sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, is it not evil <S%H7451><s%>? offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8685><s%> it now unto thy governor <S%H6346><s%>; will he be pleased <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee, or accept <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy person <S%H6440><s%>? saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

And now, I pray you, beseech <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8761><s%> <S%H6440><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> that he will be gracious <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto us: this hath been by your means <S%H3027><s%>: will he regard <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your persons <S%H6440><s%>? saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

Who is there even among you that would shut <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> for nought? neither do ye kindle <S%H215><s%> <S%H8686><s%> fire on mine altar <S%H4196><s%> for nought <S%H2600><s%>. I have no pleasure <S%H2656><s%> in you, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, neither will I accept <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> at your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

For from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> even unto the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the same my name <S%H8034><s%> shall be great <S%H1419><s%> among the goyim <S%H1471><s%>; and in every place <S%H4725><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8716><s%> shall be offered <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8716><s%> unto my name <S%H8034><s%>, and a pure <S%H2889><s%> offering <S%H4503><s%>: for my name <S%H8034><s%> shall be great <S%H1419><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

But ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8764><s%> it, in that ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The table <S%H7979><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is polluted <S%H1351><s%> <S%H8794><s%>; and the fruit <S%H5108><s%> thereof, even his meat <S%H400><s%>, is contemptible <S%H959><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

Ye said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> also, Behold, what a weariness <S%H4972><s%> is it ! and ye have snuffed <S%H5301><s%> <S%H8689><s%> at it, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; and ye brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> that which was torn <S%H1497><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and the lame <S%H6455><s%>, and the sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; thus ye brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%>: should I accept <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this of your hand <S%H3027><s%>? saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

But cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the deceiver <S%H5230><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, which <S%H3426><s%> hath in his flock <S%H5739><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%>, and voweth <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and sacrificeth <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the YY <S%H136><s%> a corrupt thing <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8716><s%>: for I am a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, and my name <S%H8034><s%> is dreadful <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.
